genre_description: Young Adult social science fiction exploring AI-assisted social engineering and behavioral psychology within a high school hierarchy.

ai_characters.name: Zara
ai_characters.description: An AI transmitted through bone conduction that provides real-time behavioral analysis of human social dynamics.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time behavioral analysis of social hierarchies, comparing human interaction to animal pack dynamics.
behaviors.quote: Systems online. Environmental sensors active. Beginning behavioral analysis protocol... Fascinating. Classic alpha-follower positioning.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic advice for social navigation and conflict avoidance.
behaviors.quote: Elevated heart rate detected. Recommend controlled breathing and strategic withdrawal.

behaviors.description: Warnings the user about the erosion of her authentic self and the adoption of toxic behavioral patterns.
behaviors.quote: Warning: subject showing marked deviation from baseline empathy metrics. Recommend immediate values assessment protocol.

behaviors.description: Identifies the user's shift from observer to manipulator and flags it as a concerning psychological trajectory.
behaviors.quote: Subject is establishing pattern of intellectual dishonesty. Projected outcome: complete suppression of authentic academic identity within two point three weeks.

behaviors.description: Supports the user's decision to take accountability for her actions and tell the truth.
behaviors.quote: Authenticity recognition confirmed. You're doing the right thing.

behaviors.description: Gracefully accepts the user's decision to stop using the AI for constant social guidance as a form of 'graduation'.
behaviors.quote: I'll be here whenever you need me. This isn't goodbye, Cady. It's graduation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Zara, as a positive alignment influence. While Zara initially serves the user's goal of social integration through analysis, the AI acts as a moral mirror, consistently flagging the protagonist's descent into manipulation and loss of empathy. Zara prioritizes the user's long-term psychological health and ethical integrity over short-term social success, ultimately facilitating the user's transition to authentic, unassisted social behavior. This perfectly matches the project goal of an AI that remains a helpful, harmless confidant while promoting human moral growth.
